flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
自然の　力を　受けて　太陽　雨水
雪雲に　姿を　変える　ポケモン。
気象が　変わると　気性も　変わるぞ。

Castform borrows the power of nature to transform itself
into the guises of the sun, rain, and snow-clouds.
This Pokémon’s feelings change with the weather.

Castform usa il potere della natura per trasformarsi in sole,
gocce di pioggia e nubi nevose. Il tipo di questo Pokémon
varia con i mutamenti meteorologici.

Castform se vale del poder de la naturaleza para tomar el
aspecto del sol, la lluvia o nubarrones de nieve. El estado de
ánimo de este Pokémon varía según el clima.

Formeo bedient sich der Kraft der Natur, um die Gestalt
der Sonne, des Regens oder von Schneewolken anzunehmen.
Die Gefühlslage dieses Pokémon verändert sich mit dem
Wetter.

Morphéo emprunte le pouvoir de la nature pour prendre
l’apparence du soleil, de la pluie ou de la neige. Le type
de ce Pokémon change en fonction du temps.

자연의 힘을 받아 태양과 빗방울
그리고 설운으로 모습을 바꾸는 포켓몬이다.
날씨가 바뀌면 기질도 바뀐다.

しぜんの　ちからを　うけて　たいよう　あま ず
ゆきぐもに　すがたを　かえる　ポケモン。
きしょうが　かわると　きしょうも　かわるぞ。

天気に　よって　姿が　変わる　ポケモン。
小さい　体を　守る　ために　大自然の
大きな　パワーを　使える　ように　なった。

Castform’s appearance changes with the weather.
This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of
nature to protect its tiny body.

L’aspetto di Castform cambia con le condizioni atmosferiche.
Questo Pokémon ha imparato a usare la potente forza
della natura per proteggere il suo corpicino indifeso.

La forma de Castform cambia con las variaciones del tiempo.
Este Pokémon consiguió aprender a usar el gran poder de la
naturaleza para proteger el pequeño cuerpo que tiene.

Formeos Erscheinung ändert sich mit dem Wetter. Dieses
Pokémon hat die Fähigkeit erworben, die mächtige Kraft der
Natur zu nutzen, um seinen winzigen Körper zu schützen.

L’apparence de Morphéo change en fonction du temps.
Ce Pokémon a appris à utiliser l’immense pouvoir de la nature
pour protéger son corps minuscule.

날씨에 따라 모습이 바뀌는 포켓몬이다.
작은 몸을 지키기 위해 대자연의
거대한 힘을 사용할 수 있게 됐다.

てんきに　よって　すがたが　かわる　ポケモン。
ちいさい　からだを　まもる　ために　だいしぜんの
おおきな　パワーを　つかえる　ように　なった。

自然の　力を　受けて
太陽　雨水　雪雲と　姿を　変える
能力を　持っている。

It has the ability to change its form into the sun,
the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on
the weather.

Ha la capacità di trasformarsi in sole, pioggia o in una
nuvola di neve, secondo le condizioni atmosferiche.

Tiene la habilidad de cambiar y adaptarse al tiempo.
Según el clima, se transformará en sol, nubarrones
de lluvia o nieve.

Es verfügt über die Eigenschaft, seinen Körper
in die Sonne, den Regen oder eine Schneewolke,
je nach Wetter, zu verändern.

Morphéo a la capacité de changer son apparence
en fonction du temps. Il utilise la force de la nature
pour combattre.

자연의 힘을 받아 태양,
빗물, 설운으로 모습을
바꾸는 능력을 가지고 있다.

しぜんの　ちからを　うけて　たいよう
あまみず　ゆきぐもと　すがたを
かえる　のうりょくを　もっている。

気温や　湿度の　変化が
体の　細胞に　影響して
姿を　変える　ポケモン。

This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different
forms based on the temperature and humidity.

Il suo aspetto varia con l’umidità e la temperatura,
che influenzano la sua struttura molecolare.

Sus células son muy sensibles a los cambios de
temperatura y humedad y se adapta sin problema.

Formeo kann seine Gestalt ändern. Seine Zellen
reagieren auf Temperaturschwankungen und
Feuchtigkeit.

Les variations de température ou d’humidité affectent
sa structure cellulaire et son apparence.

기온이나 습도의 변화가
몸의 세포에 영향을 주어
모습을 바꾸는 포켓몬이다.

きおんや　しつどの　へんかが
からだの　さいぼうに　えいきょうして
すがたを　かえる　ポケモン。

Temperature and weather affect its
cellular structure, so this Pokémon
changes form according to the weather.

Temperature and weather affect its
cellular structure, so this Pokémon
changes form according to the weather.

Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.

Son aspect change avec la météo.
On a récemment découvert que ses
molécules étaient pareilles à l’eau.

Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.

Son aspect change avec la météo.
On a récemment découvert que ses
molécules étaient pareilles à l’eau.

This Pokémon can change its cells,
taking different forms based on
the temperature and humidity.

This Pokémon can change its cells,
taking different forms based on
the temperature and humidity.

Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.

Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.

Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.

It has the ability to change its form into
the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, 
depending on the weather.

It has the ability to change its form into
the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, 
depending on the weather.

It alters its form depending on the
weather. Changes in the climate such as
the temperature and humidity appear to
affect its cellular structure.

CASTFORM borrows the power of nature
to transform itself into the guises of
the sun, rain clouds, and snow clouds. This POKéMON’s feelings change with the
weather.

CASTFORM’s appearance changes with
the weather.
This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect
its tiny body.

form_descriptions.description: Form changes along with type to match the weather in battle, due to forecast.  Castform is always in its normal form outside of battle, regardless of weather.
